# Samara James - Finest Jewelry Ecommerce Web Store - Krish

Krish TechnoLabs developed Jewelry ecommerce store for Samara James. Read the full case study that how Krish TechnoLabs helped Samara James, to manage diamond specification and combination, checkout and product navigation, track user activity for re-targeting.


Back To Work Europe Solution B2C SERVICES ConsultingDevelopment & IntegrationGrowth Support INDUSTRY Gems & Jewellery WEBSITE samarajames.com 25% Average Load decreased 60% Increased footfall 35% Conversion rate increased 150% Fully Load Time Samara James Bejeweled its Revenue Setting New Benchmarks Redefining the Jewellery fashion segment Started in 2006 in Shepperton UK, Samara James made an impeccable space amidst its customers in no time. Having specialization in making heart and arrow diamonds, they are widely known for their exquisite collection of jewellery designs. While besides their physical store, the brand did have online presence through Magento 1, however, to ensure a mature presence, they approached Krish. 'Trends come and go, and style evolves. It's important to have pieces of jewelry that are timeless and look chic despite ever-changing fashions.' Karen Elson Challenges Foraging what’s in hand Engaging customers and keeping them updated with offers and promotions. Making payment easier and buyer-friendly. Responsiveness was making it difficult for visitors to make a purchase Immature overall presence Solution Accumulating and implementing the needed blend To ensure successful implementation of the takeaways received after entire research and analysis. Having said this, soon after closely understanding the challenges, the team decided to build a strategy, aligned to which, the needed technology will be structured. The Strategy Considering their target audience, Industry, competitors, and present digital presence in mind, the team started working on every single detail collected. Rounds of meeting with concerned departments followed by shuffling ideas on linked with design and implementations. The major concentration at this stage had been on designing the interface and making the overall shopping experience easy. Technology Mobile First Design Understood the vision and delivered on a truly on-brand experience. Client Speaks Ed Searancke Director, Samara James "When you’re working with a partner, you want a partner, you want someone coming to you with creative solutions to the problem, which is what Krish offers. The team is extremely professional, very dedicated and committed to the project. I have been enjoying working with Krish." Result Enchanting the aroma of classic Jewellery While the brand was carrying a reputation of more than a decade old, new interface and functionalities further added to it. Subsequently, the brand notices an increase of around 25% in their average order value per day. Not only this, a hike of 60% was also noticed in revenue generated from sales.
